name: my-saas-project
buildCommand: curl -sSL https://get.wasp.sh/installer.sh | sh && export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin && cd my-saas-app/app && wasp build && echo '--- Wasp build finished. Listing output directory structure: ---' && ls -R .wasp/build && mkdir -p ../../build && cp -r .wasp/build/web-app/build/. ../../build/
